DOC.brief_summary: This study begin 1993 prospective , natural history study renal transplant patient ' medication compliance measure use electronic monitor cap medication vial . Hypothesis : Poor medication compliance predict adverse outcome . Enrollment close .
DOC.detailed_description: - The study complete . Patient recruitment close active patient involvement study end . - Statistical analysis monitor record new patient outcome data continue
